text: Gloria Rachel Allred (born July 3, 1941) is an American civil rights lawyer. She was born to a Jewish family. She is a feminist. Her book Fight Back and Win: My Thirty-Year Fight Against Injustice and How You Can Win Your Own Battles was published in 2007. Her daughter, Lisa Bloom, is also a lawyer.
